MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Boots Green Lane, Booth Bed Lane and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:51am on 28th December 2020.
